pull.title: refactor: share and use `GenerateRandomKey` helper
pull.body:
Making the `GeneratingRandomKey` helper (recently introduced in PR #28433, commit b6934fd03f080d437acb1fd2b665503c3d6de785) available to other modules via key.{h.cpp} allows us to create random private keys directly at CKey instantiation, in contrast to the currently needed two-step process of creating an (invalid) CKey instance first and then having to call `MakeNewKey(...)`.

This is mostly used in unit tests and a few instances in the wallet.

events.body:

<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| ACK | [Sjors](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28455#issuecomment-1870078430), [sipa](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28455#pullrequestreview-1797358660), [kristapsk](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28455#pullrequestreview-1797365533), [stratospher](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28455#pullrequestreview-1797370883), [achow101](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28455#issuecomment-1874196735) |
| Stale ACK | [kevkevinpal](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28455#issuecomment-1714891998) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with 👎 to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#28710](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28710) (Remove the legacy wallet and BDB dependency by achow101)
* [#28574](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28574) (wallet: optimize migration process, batch db transactions by furszy)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

I see `MakeNewKey` being used in 

`./src/test/multisig_tests.cpp`
`./src/test/descriptor_tests.cpp`
`./src/test/script_p2sh_tests.cpp`
`./src/test/script_standard_tests.cpp`
`./src/wallet/test/scriptpubkeyman_tests.cpp`
`./src/wallet/test/ismine_tests.cpp`
`./src/wallet/test/wallet_tests.cpp`
`./src/wallet/scriptpubkeyman.cpp`

I found these by doing
`grep -nri "MakeNewKey" ./src --binary-files=without-match`
do we plan on making this modification to these files aswell?

Concept ACK. I think this is a useful refactor to have since it's more modular to have `GenerateRandomKey` in `key.cpp` rather than net code.

> I found these by doing grep -nri "MakeNewKey" ./src --binary-files=without-match
do we plan on making this modification to these files aswell?

@kevkevinpal, it makes sense to do this refactor when we're instantiating a CKey object and also filling the value together in the same line. we can't do this in arrays for example, where the instantiation is done prior to filling values. we can do this refactor in:
1. [`script_standard_Solver_failure` ](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/7524fcff8625f0197be6cf84df285c39fcd5d6b6/src/test/script_standard_tests.cpp#L141) test
2. [`script_standard_ExtractDestination`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/7524fcff8625f0197be6cf84df285c39fcd5d6b6/src/test/script_standard_tests.cpp#L197) test

ACK 81187d04c2925bbd1281fe3cbdc2a30c2a02cca5

The Stratum v2 Template Provider in #28983 also uses the `CKey static_key; static_key.MakeNewKey(true);` pattern, so would (slightly) benefit from this change.

> do we plan on making this modification to these files aswell?

I can re-review if more tests are modified to use this new helper, but I'm also fine with leaving as is. New code can use it.

events.message:
refactor: share and use `GenerateRandomKey` helper

Making the `GenerateRandomKey` helper available to other modules via
key.{h.cpp} allows us to create random private keys directly at
instantiation of CKey, in contrast to the two-step process of creating
the instance and then having to call `MakeNewKey(...)`.

events.body:
Thanks for the reviews! I've tackled the [missing header include](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28455#discussion_r1434172881) and the two more instances where the refactoring can be done ([script_standard_Solver_failure](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/7524fcff8625f0197be6cf84df285c39fcd5d6b6/src/test/script_standard_tests.cpp#L141) and  [script_standard_ExtractDestination](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/7524fcff8625f0197be6cf84df285c39fcd5d6b6/src/test/script_standard_tests.cpp#L197)). Can be easily re-reviewed via
`$ git range-diff 81187d0...fa1d495`.

comments.body: 81187d0: we'd need to `#include <key.h>` since we're still using `GenerateRandomKey()` in `src/net.cpp`
